DOC.brief_summary: A study evaluate effectiveness tolerability MK0533 pioglitazone patient type 2 diabetes mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Tolerability MK0533 Patients With Type 2 Diabetes ( 0533-005 )
DOC.criteria: Patients age 18 70 year Type 2 diabetes able adequately control blood glucose level Note : Only patient take antihyperglycemic medicine 3 month screen Patients take medicine affect body fluid level diuretic water pill Patients take niacin certain medication Patients follow condition : liver kidney disease , poorly control high blood pressure , heart disease certain blood disorder Patients abnormal laboratory result blood test give patient start study
